short_description: fluid kinetics is a pumps & hydraulics supplier based in town of niskayuna, new york, united states.
long_description: fluid kinetics can serve your needs with the best products and experience available. we provide horizontal pumps, vertical pumps, submersible pumps, along with a host of valves and instruments. see how we can help you …. we are a manufacturer's representative for a wide variety of water and wastewater equipment, we see all our projects through to completion. the company has experienced and reliable staff to handle all customer needs. fluid kinetics, inc. represents the highest quality manufacturer of pumping equipment, valves and controls for the water, wastewater and commercial building markets. fluid kinetics, inc. provides expertise to engineering firms designing projects. fluid kinetics, inc. provides quotes and installation instructions to contractors and end users. fluid kinetics, inc. always provides startup service on all equipment and repair and service at the customers site or in our repair shop in orchard park. move left→move right↑move up↓move down+zoom in-zoom outhomejump left by 75%endjump right by 75%page upjump up by 75%page downjump down by 75%to navigate, press the arrow keys.

generated_description: fluid kinetics, legally known as fluid kinetics inc., is a manufacturer's representative company based in the town of niskayuna, new york. founded in 1981 by james c. marean and donald j. hayes, the company specializes in providing high-quality water and wastewater equipment. offers a range of products including horizontal, vertical, and submersible pumps, water service valves, waste water valves, and various instruments. the company serves the public works market, working with municipalities, engineering firms, contractors, and end-users to ensure the installation and maintenance of their equipment. also provides in-house repair services, pickup and delivery services, and complete water booster systems.
